page.title: 17ATTITUDES. (CONTD.)
page.content:
Q. What advantages do you hope the planned development will bring. A. More shops. Increased bus services to Chichester. Roundabout on A27 to slow down traffic. Mains Gas. More jobs within the village. New Village Centre building Q. What disadvantages do you think the planned development might bring. A. Spoil the quiet and peace of the village. Vandalism.
There are approx. 1200 residents in Tangmere. The majority of the peaople in full time employment do not work in the village. Many travel to Chichester, Portsmouth and Worthing, this is relatively easy because of the close proximity of the A27 trunk road. Those remaining are employed in a variety of occupations. Builders, Painters, Carpenters,mechanics (contd)
